item.title: Towards a New File Format for Big Data - SIMD-Friendly Composable Compression
item.description: Table of Contents 1 Introduction 2 Related Work 2.1 Storage Layouts 2.2 Bit-(Un)Packing 3 SIMD-Friendly Bit-(Un)Packing 4 Composable Functions 5 Composable Compression Schemes 1 Introduction 2 Related Work 2.1 Storage Layouts 2.1.1 NSM 传统上，在数据库系统中，表格数据通常按照磁盘页的起始行逐行存储。这种存储方
